original_title: Milinda meets Indian Finance Minister and National Security Adviser
original_body_lines: Pathfinder Foundation Founder and former Ambassador Milinda Moragoda last week met with Indian Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman and National Security Adviser Shri Ajit Doval in Delhi. Moragoda is on a short visit to India and has had discussions with several senior government leaders and heads of think tanks.
